bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Optimizing the Performance and Life of Lead-Acid Batteries in Remote Hybrid Power Systems
IEEE Draft Guide for Optimizing the Performance and Life of Lead-Acid Batteries in Remote Hybrid Power Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide is applicable to lead-acid batteries that are used as the energy storage component in remote hybrid power supplies. The remote hybrid application, with its dual generator option, i.e., both renewable and dispatchable generation, is advantageous in that the battery can usually be charged at will and under circumstances that may also be advantageous for the dispatchable generator.
